text.Prompt:
Write a brief product description making use of the given specs.

Product specification:
Set of 5-Adjustable Sign Holder, 8.5" x 11", Non-Glare Lense, Double Sided (Black)

Product features:
Adjustable sign holder has a height range of 26" to 37.1"
Set of 5
Holds a printed 8.5" x 11" sign. Simply insert between non-glare lenses!
Features a shovel base that is flat
Displays2go SKU#: SH8511BKP
text.Response A: This Set of 5-Adjustable Sign Holder features a shovel base that is flat and can be weighted with sand or water for extra stability. The adjustable sign holder has a height range of 26" to 37.1" and holds a printed 8.5" x 11" sign. Simply insert between non-glare lenses! With a variety of sizes and styles, we have the perfect sign holder for you!

Prompt

Write a brief product description making use of the given specs.

Product specification:
Set of 5-Adjustable Sign Holder, 8.5" x 11", Non-Glare Lense, Double Sided (Black)

Product features:
Adjustable sign holder has a height range of 26" to 37.1"
Set of 5
Holds a printed 8.5" x 11" sign. Simply insert between non-glare lenses!
Features a shovel base that is flat
Displays2go SKU#: SH8511BKP

Response A

This Set of 5-Adjustable Sign Holder features a shovel base that is flat and can be weighted with sand or water for extra stability. The adjustable sign holder has a height range of 26" to 37.1" and holds a printed 8.5" x 11" sign. Simply insert between non-glare lenses! With a variety of sizes and styles, we have the perfect sign holder for you!
